sidebar.title: Sidebar
sidebar.description: Vertical navigation panel for site or app sections, typically positioned at the side of the screen.

sidebar-without-icons.title: Sidebar without icons
sidebar-without-icons.description: Vertical navigation panel for site or app sections, typically positioned at the side of the screen.

sidebar-double.name: sidebar-double
sidebar-double.title: Double Sidebar

gantt-chart.name: gantt-chart

gantt-chart.description: A project management tool that visualizes tasks and resources over time.

screen-state.title: Screen State
screen-state.description: Component for displaying different UI states like loading, empty, or error conditions.

drawer-left.title: Drawer
drawer-left.description: A panel that slides in from the left side of the screen, showing menu items or content without leaving the current page.
